pages.text: Sulfur dioxide is a step in $(l:gas/sulfuric_acid)Sulfuric Acid$(/l) production.

It is created by putting sulfur in a $(l:block/chemical_oxidizer)Chemical Oxidizer$(/l) and used with $(l:gas/oxygen)Oxygen$(/l) in the $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) to create $(l:gas/sulfur_trioxide)Sulfur Trioxide$(/l).
